content: Patient Harlow Quinlan (member ID XQ943-7782) underwent a specialized gene therapy treatment at Mercy West Oncology Center on 03/12/2024. The treatment targeted a rare genetic mutation linked to early-onset cardiomyopathy. Pre-authorization case notes indicate coverage was approved under clinical trial protocol GT-204-19C. Follow-up appointments scheduled with Dr. Elise Varga and Dr. Tomas Ruiz.
